definition: clapper talk/patter song (in opera) with clapperboard accompaniment
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Clapper talk between two people is one type of clapper talk.
sentences.chinese: 對口快板兒是快板的一種形式，由兩個人共同表演。
